cells.data:
Live Preview

Quiver supports live preview of Markdown and LaTeX cells. You can choose "Show Preview Window" (⌃⌘P) from the "Note" menu or click the preview button in the toolbar.
You can open a note in a separate window by double clicking on it. A typical setup is like this:
Quiver’s live preview mode is very efficient. It only updates the cell that is being edited.

Presentation Mode

Quiver also comes with a full-screen presentation mode. You can choose “Enter Presentation Mode” (⌃⌥⌘P) from the “Note” menu or click the present button in the toolbar.

The presentation mode is great for classroom use, team meetings, presentations, or simply reviewing notes on your own.
